parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the column you want to delete

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to delete the hidden column, false to not

title: ITableAnnotation.DeleteColumn2
description: Deletes the specified column in this table.
signature:
System.Boolean DeleteColumn2( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the column you want to delete

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to delete the hidden column, false to not

returns: True if column is deleted successfully, false if not
remarks:
The index for both the rows and columns is 0-based.
This method deletes the entire table if you try to delete the only column in the table.
